Uses of Class
main.GameEnvironment

Packages that use GameEnvironment
Package Description
main
Contains classes that provide the core functionality of the Game.
ui
Contains user interface classes that provide user interface support and functionality for the GameEnvironment.
ui.gui
Contains user interface classes that provide a graphical interface support and functionality for the GameEnvironment.

  • Uses of GameEnvironment in main

    Constructors in main with parameters of type GameEnvironment
    Constructor Description
    RandomEvent​(GameEnvironment manager, double eventChance)
    Initialises and runs a Random Event
    RandomEvent​(GameEnvironment manager, double eventChance, double eventCheck, double eventTypeCheck)
    Initialises and runs a Random Event with the given variables (Used for Testing)

  • Uses of GameEnvironment in ui

    Constructors in ui with parameters of type GameEnvironment
    Constructor Description
    CommandLineUI​(GameEnvironment manager)
    Creates and runs the command line user interface app

  • Uses of GameEnvironment in ui.gui

    Constructors in ui.gui with parameters of type GameEnvironment
    Constructor Description
    GUIGameOverScreen​(GameEnvironment manager)
    Creates and opens the Game Over screen window
    GUIMainScreen​(GameEnvironment manager)
    Creates and opens the Main screen window
    GUISetupScreen​(GameEnvironment manager)
    Creates and opens the Setup screen window
